backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining authorization-gated CRUD for members, payments, check-ins, and user profiles with persistent state and admin/user permission checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented app features to source files, components, and requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style list of concise summaries for all frontend files used in the app.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router, authentication gating, and routes for all main pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI screen shown when a user attempts to access a restricted page.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button with state handling and React Query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new authenticated users to submit initial profile data and save it to the backend.
Main authenticated layout with navigation, header/footer, and adminâ€‘aware menu rendering.
frontend/src/components/members/Attendan: Displays a member's attendance stats and history, with admin-only check-in actions and last-30-days metrics.
frontend/src/components/members/MemberFo: Dialog form for creating or editing a member, handling controlled inputs and submit mutations.
frontend/src/components/members/Membersh: Shows membership plan and dates for a member, with a notice that full membership features are pending.
frontend/src/components/members/Payments: Shows a member's payment history and lets admins record new payments via a dialog form.
frontend/src/components/members/ProfileP: Displays core profile info for a member and allows admins to open an edit dialog.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and caches the backend actor based on identity, invalidating dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAttendance.ts: Provides hooks to fetch member check-ins and perform check-in mutations with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Provides hooks to fetch the caller's user profile, role, and admin status using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling identity loading, login, and logout via Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useMembers.ts: React Query hooks for fetching, creating, and updating members through the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/usePayments.ts: React Query hooks for retrieving and adding member payments via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains a simple wrapper hook to fetch all member data using React Query.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React root, wraps the app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/ClassesPage.tsx: UI page placeholder for future class scheduling features with static informational content.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard page displaying member statistics and recent activity using fetched member data.
frontend/src/pages/MemberDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed member info with tabs for profile, membership, payments, and attendance.
frontend/src/pages/MembersPage.tsx: Lists, searches, and manages members with admin-only creation and navigation to member details.
frontend/src/pages/PlansPage.tsx: Placeholder page for upcoming membership plan management features.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Admin-only page allowing role assignment and principal-to-member linking using canister mutations, with form validation and success/error alerts.
frontend/src/pages/SignedOutLanding.tsx: Public landing page with branding, hero sections, feature highlights, and Internet Identity sign-in handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning parameters from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme colors, typography, animations, container settings, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing features, requirements, state version, and required images for the gym management app.
